Name: Flickering Four-Leaf Sigil
Title: Flickering Four-Leaf Sigil
Desc: A wondrous symbol shaped like a four-leaf clover, it is of great assistance to one who manipulates the elements.

Talent.Name: Flickering Four-Leaf Sigil
Talent.Desc: Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C303227]</color> to target character: At the End Phase of Every Round, you will switch to this character.

C303227.Name: Four-Leaf Sigil
C303227.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Switch to the attached character.
